dialogues.text: Zeiss! What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: It continues to eat whenever it pleases. It needs to learn-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: The only thing it could learn from this is that you’re a nitwit, and it probably already knows that! And the harness-

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: The neuro-implant induces nausea, not pain.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: This is behavior modification, Zeiss, not torture. Joyce and Nick have returned as well, Kroner standing at something like attention behind them. Maya crosses to a narrow DOOR-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Unlock.

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: He's very upset-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: At you. Unlock. Zeiss hits a switch and we hear a BOLT shoot open. xX-5 h it too, snapping to attention-  ‘e ‘e 58. ick watches as Maya slides open a narrow DOOR, squeezes i CHANG! Zeiss hits the switch and the dccr closes behind h X-5 stands across the cage from her, wary- Maya doesn’t move from next to the door for a moment, watching the beast-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Stay. She slowly crosses to the beast, never losing eye-contact

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Easy- easy- She is right next to X-5 now, holding its eyes as she def unclips the harness and pulls it off-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Good boy. She turns her back on the monster, slowly walks to the do The door shoots open, she squeezes out- CHANG! The door shuts behind her. She turns to Joyce, still angry-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Every time I start to make some progress with this animal one of your thugs sets it back two weeks.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: We have a timetable to be aware of.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Well you'd better push it back. She strides away. Joyce indicates xX-5 to Nick-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: A relatively new recruit. You know the type, lots of attitude, a bit wild-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: How many of these things do you have?

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Unfortunately the genetic engineering involved in their creation renders them sterile. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHERMAN (cont'd) If we're going to expand and have a breeding program-~ ‘e

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: We need the embryos that you stole from us.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I’m not so sure that’s a good idea. What if you take them out for a spin and one decides to go AWOL?

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Even if the neuro-implant malfunctioned they wouldn’t get far. Their bodies are capable of creating insulin but lack the stimulant that causes it to be secreted- only we can perform this function.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Without us they can last only an hour, maybe less.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (nods toward Maya) The patrol we went on this morning- she didn’t train them to do that, did she? Sherman looks away-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: There was a South African gentleman named de Vroot- wonderful storyteller- seemed to be getting on very well with his trainees-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: And what happened to him?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (hesitant) That's not totally clear-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: We found one of his shoes. Joyce slaps Nick on the back, winks-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Big risks, big pay, my friend. Dare to be great.  60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long wooden table, tapestries on the walls- there shoul tankards of ale and serving wenches, but instead it’s Nic Maya, Sherman and Joyce sitting down for dinner with BARO HERMAN VON DRAX, a very self-satisfied character who has spent a lifetime getting whatever he wants-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Courage, intelligence, the so- called ‘killer instinct‘- these are qualities I have always looked for in my employees, but it is the rare to find them all in the same individual. So I think- ‘Why not give Nature a helping hand?’

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: (fawning) The human DNA we used in the deinonychus came from Baron von Drax. Nick looks von Drax over-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that you mention it, I can see the resemblance. Maya hides a smile, but the Baron is not distracted-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: We created our warriors from only the finest ingredients.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You can combine behavioral attributes like you’re making a cake?

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: At the moment we can narrow them down to a certain section of the chain. It is possible that other less desirable traits might hitch- hike, so to speak, and end up as part of the organism.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: But this mix gives you something greater than its parts- they are full of hybrid vigor. Like the Swiss.  oe NICK But the Swiss aren't sterile. Von Drax shoots Nick a hard, appraising look,

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: I am the twenty-third Baron von Drax, Mr. Harris. I assure you that we are not! Nick sits back-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: In the second world war there was a program to train sea lions to place magnetic mines on enemy ships. Tireless swimmers, able to stay under without oxygen tanks-—

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Did they blow anything up?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Mostly fishing boats. They couldn’t pass up a meal. e

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: We‘re training our animals not to eat what they kill. That’s been the most difficult instinct to modify so far.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: So- He looks to Joyce-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: -the embryos are on their way, ja?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Mr. Harris is still considering our offer. Von Drax looks stricken-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: (slightly threatening) Consider it @ as quickly as you can, Mr. Harris. 2 Patience is not part of my genetic heritage. 61. then bursts out  {e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick sits on the edge of his bed, watching a phony-lookin WAR MCVIE. He clicks it OFF, crosses to the door, tries i not locked!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick comes down the spiral STAIRCASE of the tower, noting several SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS as he goes-—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick steps out onto the TORCH-lit PARAPET of the castle. sees Maya sitting, brooding, on the base of an ancient CATAPULT. He approaches, taps the catapult-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I could send you over the moat with this if you’d like. Maya looks up, smiles-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: I may take you up on that.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: That‘s not the Grendel International spirit I’m hearing. Maya shoots a look down into the courtyard- Kroner stands leaning against a wall, pretending he’s just out for a sm monitoring the conversation. Nick sees him, understands. Maya rises and they begin to stroll around the parapet-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Had a few setbacks today.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: So how does one get to be a dinosaur trainer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Oh- I got my doctorate in behavioral sciences, did some field work with wolves in the north of Canada till the grant money started drying up, and then- well, there aren’t that many practical applications. So I took a job with the circus.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: The circus?

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: In the ring with the whip and chair, pushing the big cats through their routines. Then there was a certain trapeze artist I wanted to get away from, so when I was approached for this job-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You knew what you were getting into?

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: For my fifteenth birthday my father promised to take me to opening day at Jurassic Park. I've still got the ticket. When I heard I'd be working with animals that used to be extinct-- well, I didn’t ask too many questions about what they were going to be trained to do.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: In the cage this morning- how did you know that thing wouldn’t go for you? Maya stops and they look out over the TOWN down the mount only a few LIGHTS still on-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: When a wolf pack works a herd of elk they'll single out the weakest- an orphaned juvenile, an older adult on its last legs- and look it straight in the eye.  e 2 64.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY ROOM
dialogues.text: Joyce and von Drax stand watching and listening to Nick a Maya, who are being tracked by a SURVEILLANCE CAMERA-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA, (VIDEO)
dialogues.text: There's a conversation of death that goes on between them, hunter and prey, almost an understanding. I’ve seen the rest of the herd continue to graze peacefully while one of their number is set upon and killed. Joyce turns to reassure the Baron-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: I wouldn‘t worry to much about Nick. He’ll come around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick watches Maya's face, animated in the TORCHLIGHT-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Twenty yards away there’s this grisly murder and they keep chewing grass. Because they know it’s not their turn.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: So you just looked it in the eye and you could tell-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (arriving) She’s a bit of a hypnotist, our Maya. Joyce steps out from the base of the SECURITY TOWER-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: But she doesn’t really approve of our goals here.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Wild animals should not-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: First of all, they're not wild, they‘re bio-engineered. We created them. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOYCE (cont'd) And like any other weapenized organism, their effectiveness depends on the skill cf those who deploy them. He turns to Nick-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Like any good soldier, eh Nick?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Good soldiers care what side they're on.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Oh, we're on the side of the angels here- He pulls out a PHOTOGRAPH and hands it to Nick-

dialogues.speaker: PHOTOGRAPH
dialogues.text: In the photo a LITTLE GIRL of about ten sits on a pony, smiling at the camera-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Who's this?

dialogues.speaker: PARAPET
dialogues.text: Joyce looks smug, having played his trump card-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: She's the little girl whose life you're going to save.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the large WALL-SCREEN is a blow-up of an AERIAL PHOTO section of a PORT CITY-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: This section of the docks in Tangier has mostly been abandoned. A ground-level PHOTO of dilapidated SHACKS AND WAREHOUSES appears on the screen-  ‘e ‘e

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Our sources inform us that Isabel Chartiers is being held somewhere in the guarter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick sits with Joyce as he clicks the next image cnto the screen-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Her father is Betrand Chartiers, chairman of the Duhamel Group, which maintains substantial financial holdings in many of France's former colonies. A well-dressed businessman, CHARTIERS, appears on the scr

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Two of his employees have already been kidnapped. The first, a minor functionary, was killed during protracted negotiations. With the second, a junior vice president, the company paid the ransom immediately-- with the same result. A photo of French police carrying a loaded BODY BAG out o tenement building appears-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: And the kidnappers?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: They seem to be motivated by a personal grudge against Monsieur Chartiers as much as by the lure of ransom money. They call themselves the North African Liberation Front, but the little we know of them suggests that their motives are more criminal than political.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: And you're sure she’s still alive? Joyce hits the clicker again. A shaky VIDEO appears on th screen- several black-hooded KIDNAPPERS move about in the foreground and background of a smallish room as little IS faces the lens, sitting at a central table-  67.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (VIDEO)
dialogues.text: Papa, Maman- j'etais en bon santé mais vous me manquez beaucoup. Ces gens ici m'epouvaisent et il faut gue payez a eaux tout ce-qu'ils demandent.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: She says she’s scared and wants to go home. They cross to a MODEL of the waterfront quarter laid out table-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: That arrived yesterday. They‘ve given Chartiers a week to deliver two million euros.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: A week is-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: -is all we've got. We can only hope they'll keep her alive at least till the ransom exchange.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I could take a half-dozen good men and-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: And what? Knock on doors? The quarter is a half-mile square. Our deinonychus, given a few personal articles, will sniff the girl out within minutes.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: So let one of them find her and we‘1l-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Come in with guns blazing? You notice in the videos, they always have her in the center- to shoot at them, you put her in the middle of a fire-fight. But if the only shooting, should there be any, comes from them-  68.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: And what if your dincsaurs bust in and one of the kidnappers keeps nis head long enough to turn a gun on her?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Then she will be spared the very graphic sight cf what happens next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick stands before the five Xes, who are lined up outside chute, staring at him- Sherman, portable radio control in hand, and Maya stand behind him- Behind them are Joyce, Zeiss, and a DOZEN of von Drax's ‘Mercenaries’, armed and wary. Everybody is wearing one o the pheromone armbands- Nick is in drill sergeant mode now, standing at parade re and calling out-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Any soldier worth his pay has a name to answer to, not a number. Even the most sniveling little lap dog answers to its name- Zeiss!

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: (instinctively) Sir?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: See what I mean? Nick walks slowly along the line of Xes, from highest to lowest-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Achilles-- Hector-- Perseus-- Orestes--- He pauses in front of X-1, the biggest and most uneasy-— looking of the group, considers-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: -Spartacus. He turns to address the humans-  69.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You will learn these names and from this moment forward will not fail to refer to and address the warriors by them. Only three members of the team will be chosen for the mission at hand, but all will be trained for it. He looks specifically at Maya-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: From now on- and this is very important- all military directives will be given by me and by me only. Is that understood?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: very low light level. Spartacus slowly moves across the r toward a table with a soccer ball, a boombox radio and a roast pig on a platter lined up on it-

dialogues.speaker: OBSERVATION ROOM
dialogues.text: Nick, Maya, Sherman, and behind them, Joyce, watch a NIGH VISION version of Spartacus’ movement on a MONITOR-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Okay, give him the works. Sherman flips a switch and-

dialogues.speaker: ENCLOSURE
dialogues.text: BLAM! Pop! Pop! Pop! At-at-at-at-at-at-at! SOUNDS of GUNFIRE and FLASHES on all sides of Spartacus. He ROARS, then hurries to the table and sniffs each item, settling the boombox, which he deftly lifts up in one clawed hand moves back to the other side of the enclosure-

dialogues.speaker: OBSERVATION ROOM
dialogues.text: Nick clicks a STOPWATCH-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Stimulus off.  e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sherman hits a switch and the fireworks stop, the LIGHTS on in the enclosure. Spartacus turns to glare at Nick. Ni nods back to him, clicks on a speaker-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (into speaker) Excellent work, Spartacus. (to Sherman) Shoot him some love, Sherman. Sherman turns a dial-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: You’re overdoing it with the serotonin.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (nods) Tomorrow we'll reward and punish with insulin. Remind them that we control their vital functions.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: We’re making them into a bunch of drug addicts.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Some day a pat on the back and a ‘Good boy’ might be enough to motivate them. He stares back at the defiant Spartacus-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I don’t think we’re there yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MILITARY MUSIC as we FOLLOW the raptors over and through kind of OBSTACLE COURSE. They balance as they cross a sin log bridge, climb a mock-up of a two-story tenement wall fire escape, jump down, pick up speed to hurdle a trench of FIRE and finally slow to a cautious walk, sniffing at ground as they go- We PAN to Nick, Joyce and Maya watching, all them wearing helmets with safety visors, standing behind a protective

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Von Drax is not going to be happy if one of his investments gets blown apart here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they can't sniff out a mine six inches under the dirt their aggressiveness becomes a liability-- lock at this- We SHIFT to see the raptors. The others are holding back, watching, as Achilles sniffs his way through the minefiel occasionally pressing his tail against the ground-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: There’s a scent gland under his tail-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: He‘s marking a trail for the others.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Did you teach them that?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I wish I had. Saves time, only risks one member of the team-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Insightful behavior. They watch as Achilles gets to the other side of the minefield, calls back to the others with a CLICKING noise The other four wind their way, single file, along the exa route Achilles took-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Makes you wonder what else they've been cooking up. Spartacus, at the rear, shoots a look to Nick-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maya stands at the center of the cage where she took the harness off Achilles. She is surrounded by the raptors, standing at ‘attention’. She has an armful of LITTLE GIRL

dialogues.speaker: CLOTHING-
dialogues.text: Sherman and Nick stand outside the enclosure with Zeiss a few other Mercenaries-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: When each one sniffs her clothing I'll give hima jolt-  e

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: We want them to protect her, not be afraid of her.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: What then?

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Oxytocin to the forebrain.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: They’re not going into labor-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: In males it reduces infanticide, promotes parenting behavior and long-term pair bonding.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: The Daddy drug. Didn’t know there was one.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: I'm doing this under protest. He dials in the oxytocin as Maya offers the clothes up fo each raptor to sniff-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: We should repeat this every day till the mission. That smell is all they'll have to track her down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four PRACTICE BUILDINGS, shells that have been rigged up resemble what we‘ve seen in the waterfront quarter, stand too far from the chute- Three of the raptors- Spartacus, Perseus and Orestes- tro out of the chute, each now wearing something like a FLAK strapped around their bodies. They cluster together-

dialogues.speaker: OBSERVATION BLIND
dialogues.text: Nick, Joyce, Maya, and Sherman are in a dugout OBSERVATIO BLIND nearby, watching the raptors directly and on VIDEO

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: The body armor doesn’t seem to bother them.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: They're used to harnesses. It’s fairly light-weight- Maya points to a METER-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: They're talking it over.

dialogues.speaker: CU METER
dialogues.text: An oscilloscope-like READOUT is hopping all over the plac

dialogues.speaker: MAYA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ultra-sounds,-

dialogues.speaker: RAPTORS
dialogues.text: The three raptors have spread out as they approach the buildings, throats working but no sound we can hear comin out-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: -way out of our range.

dialogues.speaker: SPARTACUS
dialogues.text: Spartacus lifts his snout, catching the scent. He makes a deep GRUNT and the others join him, looking at a smallish SHED made of corrugated metal. They split up, each taking different spot to surround the shed-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: That’s it, fellas, triangulate-

dialogues.speaker: SPARTACUS, RAPTORS
dialogues.text: Spartacus opens his jaws to make another ultra-sound, and three charge in unison! WHAM! Orestes head-butts through the front door!  74. @ ce ws SMASH! Perseus hops feet-first through a side window! CRUUUUNCH! Spartacus hits the opposite side, punching his forearms through the corrugated metal and ripping a huge section of the wall away! Pa-pap-pap-pap-pap-pap! Blam! Blam! TEST DUMMIES dressed like the kidnappers and holding WEAPONS are triggered to up FIRING loud bursts of blank ammo! The raptors rip into the dummies, weapons and body parts flying, dispatching a quartet of them in seconds. They tu on the last dummy, Orestes about to take a bite- then freezing- It is a DUMMY of a small GIRL, dressed like Isabel Charti in the video. Orestes sniffs, knocking the dummy over on side. Spartacus GRUNTS and Orestes moves away. The alpha raptor steps in, sniffs, then gently takes the dummy in i claws and rights it-

dialogues.speaker: OBSERVATION BLIND
dialogues.text: @ Joyce is ecstatic-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: That was spectacular! Even with the kidnappers loaded up and on full alert-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (less impressed) Thin walls, no corridors to go down-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: They're ready.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Sure. They’re ready to take on an army of dummies. Flesh and blood kidnappers, though-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Ready or not, the payoff is scheduled for Thursday. We go tomorrow. Joyce climbs out of the bunker. Nick is not pleased with 9 hurry-up-  75.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (to Sherman) Blast them with bliss, Sherman. And feed them when they get back inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not much happening in the lab tonight. A MAINTENANCE MAN runs a FLOOR BUFFER-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIGHTS HALF-DIMMED, the raptors move slowly, uneasy-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick sits alone, watching his warriors—

dialogues.speaker: MAYA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You be careful tomorrow. Nick looks up to see Maya joining him-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I'm not the one they'll be shooting at.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: It’s not the kidnappers you have to worry about. (nods toward raptors) When it goes down, just make sure you're somewhere safe.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I’ve seen you walk right up to them-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: When I was in the ring with the big cats I learned never to think they were my friends. You turn your back and-- well, they can‘t help themselves-—

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: What if one went for you when you were looking it straight in the eye?  st ] 77.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Tf you let them have the DNA they'll prebably let you go.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) Not here. I was held in the desert for fourteen months. Wo war had been declared, so we were just- if we’d all disappeared nobody would have made a fuss. She must be so scared- Maya smiles sadly, gives him a kiss on the cheek-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Good luck tomorrow. She exits. Nick goes back to contemplating the raptors-— FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A big TRUCK pulls up at the edge of the decaying Tangier waterfront, a battered SUV gliding to a stop next to it- The tailgate of the truck swings down hydraulically, beco a RAMP- Spartacus, Perseus and Orestes step down the ramp. They a rigged up in the protective armor with the addition of a small night-vision VIDEO CAMERA on each, mounted on the shoulder-

dialogues.speaker: SUV
dialogues.text: The INTERIOR of the SUV is totally different than its outside. Very high-tech, with three MONITORS being fed by each of the raptors, letting us know what they see- Nick is wearing a pheromone armband and a speaker set on head, leaving his hands free-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Squadron hold. Camouflage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ee 79.

dialogues.speaker: PERSEUS
dialogues.text: Perseus pauses by an ancient two-story WAREHOUSE. A faded SIGN indicates it has sometning to do with olive oil. Perseus sniffs, then lifts his head and opers his jaws wi calling ultra-sonically. Spartacus, then Crestes appear t join him. They put their heads together, facing the build suUV - NICK Nick gets a good look at the building from the raptors’ cameras, checks on his locator grid-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (into radio) Looks like we‘ve got something- Sector twelve, building three-six-two- He brings the SUV to a stop, unhooks his seatbelt and lif short-barrelled AUTOMATIC WEAPON from the seat beside him

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (muttering to himself) Let’s just hope it’s not a meat-packing plant.

dialogues.speaker: WAREHOUSE
dialogues.text: Perseus stays by the FRONT ENTRANCE as— Orestes moves around back to the LOADING DOCK-— And Spartacus painstakingly climbs the FIRE ESCAPE that l up to a second floor WINDOW-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are inside the warehouse on the GROUND FLOOR, rows of BARRELS full of OLIVE OIL taking up much of the space. We move past them to see a trio of KIDNAPPERS asleep on cots weapons within arm’s reach- Four MORE KIDNAPPERS sit at a small table under a harsh l playing cards, their weapons propped against chair legs o lying on the table- We CONTINUE past these men to a set of iron STAIRS, CRANI UP to the second-floor LOFT. We push through an open door into the old OFFICE-  80. Two MCRE KIDNAPPERS sleep on mattresses on the floor, whi third sits near the window, feet up on the ancient desk, on his lap, yawning and nodding off- In the middle of the room, curled up in a big upholstered EASY CHAIR with the stuffing coming out the arms, is ISAB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick is out of the SUV now, ready to roll, looking in thr the window at the grid locator-

dialogues.speaker: LOCATOR SCREEN
dialogues.text: The raptors, represented by three BLINKING RED DOTS, have surrounded the building-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Nick, tense, speaks low into his headset-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: All together, boys. You're go to enter-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch the claws of Spartacus’ foot grip the next rung He shifts his weight ever so slowly, the fire escape meta CREAKING just a bit. One more step- he’s up on the platfo looking in the window-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kidnapper at the desk is nearly asleep, his back to t window as the massive head appears behind him, peering in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spartacus calls in ultra-sound then-  81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASH! Spartacus thrusts his head through the window, ROA then grabs the dozing kidnapper in his jaws, the man SCREAMING as he is lifted and shaken!

dialogues.speaker: GROUND FLOOR
dialogues.text: WHAM! Perseus batters his way through the front entrance door, sprawling off-balance, knocking into piled BARRELS sending them crashing to and rolling on the floor! CRASH! RIP! Orestes begins to tear apart the metal loadin dock DOOR in the rear- The kidnappers at the table grab for their weapons but BA Perseus charges through them, splintering the table with mighty blow and sending the men flying-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mercenaries grab weapons and run out-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Go! Go! Go! As they run out we TILT DOWN to a MONITOR. We see a TERRIFIED KIDNAPPER firing his weapon toward the camera-—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spartacus has smashed his way in through the window, the men on the mattresses awake now and Bap-bap-bap-bap-bap-b FIRING at him!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Isabel is sitting up, confused and terrified- she ducks a deinonychus foot clamps onto the arm of the chair, Sparta using it as a springboard to leap across the room onto th kidnappers! Isabel throws her blanket over her head and curls into fe position. We hear THRASHING and SCREAMING-  82.

dialogues.speaker: GROUND FLOGR
dialogues.text: Bap-bap-bap-bap-bap-bap! The kidnappers scatter, FIRING their weapons, tripping over barrels and upended furnitur sliding on the olive-oil-slicked floor- -but both Orestes and Perseus are in now and in full atta mode- leaping, sliding, stabbing with their sickle-claws, grabbing men in their jaws and hurling them across the ro Two of the kidnappers duck cut the front entrance-— One kidnapper tries to run up the iron stairs to the offi He gets halfway up when CHOMP! Orestes nails him from beh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick is hurrying down the street toward the warehouse. Th two escaped kidnappers come rushing around the corner, se him- Bap-bap-bap-bap-bap-bap! they open up with their Uzi Nick diving for cover behind the burnt-out hulk of a tire less, ABANDONED CAR- ROUNDS smash into the wreck, tearing chunks of metal off around Nick's head. Not the greatest cover- We shoot from profile as the kidnappers walk toward Nick, FIRING as they come- We change angle- we're fifty yards behind them and coming fast- WHAM! Perseus flattens one of the men, running over him from behind, then wheels and jumps on the other, tear at him! Nick jumps up and runs past the raptor to the warehouse—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick enters through the front entrance. We FOLLOW him as steps over smashed barrels, busted furniture, discarded weapons, dead bodies and spreading puddles of olive oil. pauses at the foot of the iron stairs, listens. Quiet. He calls up-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: It's me! I’m coming up! He changes channels on his headset, speaks more softly-  ‘oe 83.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I’m in the building, no resistance apparent. Shut them down. Repeat- shut them down, now! He climbs the iron staircase, weapon at ready, squeezing kidnapper’s BODY hanging upside-down. He reaches the top, steps into the office- Spartacus and Orestes face him, one side of Spartacus’ he mess, BLOOD dripping down from it. Spartacus stands with foot resting on the overturned easy chair. They look wild eyed and not shut down at all, but don‘t attack- Nick takes a step forward. Spartacus HISSES. Nick freezes looks around at the devastation in the room- BLOOD on the walls, mattresses torn to shreds, one BODY hanging half o of the window--

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Where is she? Spartacus GROWLS-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You've done good work here. Outstanding. Where is the girl? He sees the chair beneath the raptor’s foot-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Back. Move back. Spartacus hesitates, then slowly steps away from the chai not taking his eyes off Nick. Orestes is starting to nod the radio-controlled neuropeptides do their work- Nick steps forward, lifts the chair away- A small figure under a blanket, not moving- Nick takes the edge of the blanket, lifts-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A half-dozen VEHICLES screech to halt in front of the warehouse, mercenaries jumping out, fully armed-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Surround the warehouse! We don’t know what's going to come out of there-  ‘eo 84.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Hold your fire! She points- Nick steps out cf the warehouse with Tsabel in his arms, little girl clutching at his neck and regarding the mercenaries with wide eyes as he carries her through them Maya at the AMBULANCE-

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Sont réels les monstres que j'avais vue? (Were those monsters I saw real?)

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Non, non- c'est seulement un réve. (No- it’s only a dream.) Nick hands Isabel off to a MEDIC-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Ces gens tu portez a tes parents. C'est fini, ton cauchemar. (These people will take you to your parents. Your nightmare is all over.) Joyce is ecstatic-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Not a scratch on her! How are the boys?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Spartacus is shot up pretty bad. There's- there’s a lot of cleaning up to do in there. Joyce signals to Zeiss-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Get on it. The mercenaries hurry into the warehouse. Maya steps clos to Nick-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: You okay? Nick grins. He is stoked from the action, the success of rescue-  ‘e 85.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Never better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLOODLIGHTS illuminate the COURTYARD of the castle as a HELICOPTSR lowers and settles onto the ground. Von Drax a his house staff are waiting, and break into APPLAUSE as N and the others step out of the chopper-—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POP! The cork goes flying and CHAMPAGNE is dealt into glasses-— von Drax is at the head of the table, toasting Nick, Joyc Maya and Sherman-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Tonight, my friends, we have made history!

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: To our victorious reptiles! They raise their glasses and drink-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: (excited) The video was thrilling- I felt like I was in the room with them!

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Be thankful that you weren't.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: I think we are quite ready to show our capabilities to the world market.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Market?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: There’s another mission we've been planning, Nick. Ona larger scale-  86.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: And this time several interested parties will be on hand to watch- including a representative from your country’s Special Forces, Mr. Harris.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: We want you on board, Nick. Nick considers a moment-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Do I have a choice?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: I watched you out there. You were in your element. Maya watches Nick, still flushed with victory, worried-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: It’s in your blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hector and Achilles put their heads together with Orestes Perseus, exchanging CHIRPING and CLICKING NOISES. War stories---- FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We look down on a TABLE TOP MODEL of an extensive jungle fortress-- checkpoints, guardhouses, barracks, drug processing buildings and a lavish hacienda-style home-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Pepe Aguilar controls a large percentage of the heroin and cocaine still moving out from Latin America.  87.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: He has a private army, his own fleet of cargo planes, ana here, at Cuchikamba, a state-of-the-art processing plant. Joyce and Nick regard the layout. Nick neds to the BLOW-U of AERIAL PHOTOS mounted on the wall-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: So bomb it off the map.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Aguilar also keeps several dozen prisoners in the compound- kidnapped members of prominent families, politicians from all the major and minor parties, and, most importantly, the president's favorite niece. He’s way back in the jungle here- to make a Se} surprise attack with the number of ground troops you'd need-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: It wouldn't be much of a surprise.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: It's the perfect scenario for our very unique services. Penetrate their defenses and eliminate Pepe Aguilar-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: -without hurting the hostages. This isn't a special ops mission, it’s an invasion.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (nods) I suspect we'll need the whole team this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPITTERS through the bars of the enclosure. Both have Nick, Maya, Sherman and mercenary team face a pair of 9 control implants on their heads-  88.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: These things were on the island.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: (shrugs) They seem to thrive underground. Hard to track them all down-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Were they bio-engineered? Sherman flips down the plexiglas faceplate on his SAFETY HELMET, takes three steps toward the enclosure-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Not to the extent the deinonychus are, but they’re relatively controllable. Chlymidosaurus sputori- ‘chlymidosaurus' meaning ‘frilled lizard’, and sputori meaning- One of the spitters raises its spiny mantle and hawks a p of sticky BLACK MUCUS, CHHHHHOKKK! --- -through the air where it sticks, SPLAT! to Sherman's faceplate-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: -well, you get the idea. We've trained these spitters with the idea that there might be some tight spaces we need access to-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (naming them) From now on they’re Casper and Pollux. Sherman wipes his faceplate clean, looks at the spitters-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Which is which?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: various of the drug lair structures have been recreated i the valley training area. The control Humvee waits by a GUARD TOWER checkpoint-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .e

dialogues.speaker: GUARD TOWER
dialogues.text: Joyce, Zeiss and ANOTHR MERCENARY stand on top cf the tow Joyce watching the distance through binoculars-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick, Sherman and Maya watch the monitors in the Humvee-—

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (over radio) Send them out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casper and Pollux emerge from the CHUTE, followed by the deinonychus. All are fitted with body armor and shoulder— mounted cameras-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick speaks into his headset-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Squad forward to objective. Maximum alert. They watch the monitors as the animals head cautiously fo the trees-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You'd think that the big ones would just eat the little ones.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: We threw a chlymidosaurus in with the big boys early on. They’ve got glands full of that toxin they expectorate-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: The deinonychus were sick for days.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I bet the spitter wasn’t too thrilled about it either.  90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casper and Pollux lead the squad, slightly spread out, through the woods. Casper suddenly stops, HISSING, his sp MANTLE popping out- He is standing a few inches from a TRIP WIRE, about a two feet high, that runs from tree to tree- The deinonychus carefully step over the wire as the spitt furiously dig, quickly burrowing under it-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The humans watch on the dino-cam monitors-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The squad has come to a spot where the trees thin out and can see a metal FENCE ahead, eight feet high, with CONCER WIRE on the top edge- They slow, the bigger deinonychus stepping to the fore-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (over radio) Alright, direct entry this time. Flying wedge. We see some rearranging of their positions on the monitor

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: MONITORS
dialogues.text: On two of the monitors we see the POV as the bearer rushe toward the fence-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spartacus and Hector are sprinting full tilt toward the f as the others trot behind them. WHAM! they leap in unison and hit the fence with both hindlegs extended, flattening ten-foot section and making a breech! The others pour through and all spread out into the mock-up compound-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: gl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joyce brings his binoculars down-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Here they come!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On one of the SPITTER'S MONITORS we see a somewhat camouflaged MACHINE GUN BUNKER up ahead. The spitter dive in-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We FOLLOW as Orestes and Perseus bust into a long BARRACK BUILDING, tossing furniture and NARCO DUMMIES as they hus from one end to the other-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Achilles bursts into the courtyard where the guard tower Humvee sit, immediately WHAM! charging to butt his head against the base of the tower, knocking it off center!

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: He’s supposed to climb that, not knock it over-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: It’s Achilles--

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Shut him down!

dialogues.speaker: TOWER
dialogues.text: WHAM! another charging head-butt and the tower is at a fo five degree angle, wood beginning to CRACK and give way-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Shut him off! Shut him off!  ® Achilles takes another running start, this time jumping o the side of the tower, his weight bringing it CRASHING to ground! The men roll out of the crow’s nest, the mercenar coming up FIRING, Bap-bap-bap-bap-bap! but Achilles silec him with a deadly downward swipe of his sickle-claew!

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: off! Shut them off, all of them!

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: I have! They should be unconscious! WHAM! Achilles hits the Humvee broadside with his head an they are rolled upside down! Nick tries to clear his pist as Sherman freaks-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Oh please don’t eat me don’t eat me don't eat me! Quiet. Very quiet. Then a face appears at the passenger- side window, Nick whipping his gun around-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Easy. He‘s down.

dialogues.speaker: ACHILLES
dialogues.text: The deinonychus lies on his side, breathing shallowly, a glazed look on his eyes, as Nick, Maya and Joyce approach Sherman sits on the side of the flipped Humvee behind the shaking uncontrollably-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: A berserker. We've had problems with him before.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I think he knew exactly what he was doing.

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: The response time on all of them keeps getting longer-  93.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: They're not machines! You can't just point your finger and expect them to kill whoever you-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Bre you suggesting that they have a conscience?

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: It would be nice if someone around here did.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: If you're not behind the program, Maya, you can always~-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Quit? I’d be dead before I got across the moat. It’s out in the open now, Joyce and Maya glaring at each other. Zeiss returns, rifle in hand-

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: The others are all down, too. Looks like they were just taking care of business. He gives Achilles a hard kick in the ribs-

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: It's just this son of a-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: He sees and hears everything you do.

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: Not for long. Zeiss buts the barrel of the rifle to Achilles’ temple-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Belay that! We need to know what went wrong here. (calls to Sherman) I want a full work-up on him and a report tomorrow morning. We don’t have time for this! Maya is looking down at the BODY of the slain mercenary-  94.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: What about him?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Accidents happen. He steps close her, menacing-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Which is why we must all be very careful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The courtyard is lit up with TORCHES. Baron von Drax is engaging in some target practice- shooting bolts from an ancient CROSSBOW across the courtyard to SHATTER porcelai VASES that have been set up in a row. Joyce looks on as Kroner reloads the crossbow after every shot-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Nick steps out from the base of the tower just as SMASH! vase is shattered only a few feet from him. Zeiss stands behind him, armed-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Nice shot.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: I am an expert with several archaic weapons.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Very useful, if you run into some archaic enemies.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: And what about you, Mr. Harris- are you a friend or an enemy?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: An employee. (nods to Zeiss) He says you wanted to see me.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: (indicates) Would you mind placing another vase on the stand for me? Nick picks up a vase from the ground-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: These look expensive.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Priceless. But I’m tired of them. Nick reaches to put the vase on the target stand- SMASH! Drax shoots it out of his hand! Nick looks at his hand, c and bleeding, then calmly turns to face the Baron-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: As I am tired of waiting for you to return our property.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: We don’t really have a deal, do we?

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Your payment-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: My payment isn’t much good unless I’m free to spend it. von Drax points the reloaded crossbow at Nick’s head-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: You wish to leave us? Nick walks slowly across the courtyard, straight at von D Joyce watches his boss, tense, not sure the Baron won’t p the trigger-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (mutters) We need him- Nick stops only a few feet away from the deadly crossbow. speaks softly-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You're keeping Maya here. She wants to go.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Miss Lundberg is not one of our more enthusiastic employees, no, but it wouldn’t be prudent to-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You let her leave, no strings, no repercussions, and I tell you where I left the aerosol can.  ‘e 96.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: If she talks about what we‘re doing here-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: After the demonstration you'll be begging for publicity. The whole point of a strike force like this one is to intimidate the people who don‘t have one.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: And if we let her go then, you’ll stay with the program?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Like you said- it’s what I was meant to do. Von Drax smiles, shifts the aim of the crossbow ever so slightly and FIRES it past Nick’s ear. SMASH!

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: We have an agreement. Now- where are the embryos?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! The ankylosaurus methodically smashes his tail into the dungeon wall, a pile of stone a mortar at its feet-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Nick watches the great armored beast, thinking. Maya join him, watches for a moment-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (nods to ankylosaurus) I know how he feels.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: They're talking to each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Achilles pacing in a steel-reinforced ISOLATION CA He makes a high-pitched CALL, and is answered by several the other deinonychus, their CALLS echoing from another p of the cavern-  37. oS MAYA (0.S.) they've been going at it for hours.

dialogues.speaker: OBSERVATION BOOTH
dialogues.text: Nick and Maya look in from the booth. Achilles CALLS agai

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: He’s telling them about his escape attempt. Like any other good prisoner. We used a tapping code.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Do you think all that was planned today?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Somebody has to test the envelope, see how far you can get-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: What Sherman did today would have killed this animal a month ago. e@ Their brains must be developing new x pathways, rearranging circuitry like people do after a stroke- RRRRRRRRAGHHHHHH! Achilles screams, staring defiantly at two of them-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I told them where the embryos were.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: (horrified) Nick, no! Why would you-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: As soon as this demonstration is over, no matter how it goes, you're free to walk.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: And you trust them?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: No. But I’ll work for them.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: How can you say that? ‘e  98.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Mercenaries have existed all through history, like weapons. The only question is who's using them and what for. Maya looks at him for a long moment, glances up-

dialogues.speaker: SURVEILLANCE CAMERA
dialogues.text: A wide-lens SECURITY CAMERA stares down at them-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maya leans forward and kisses Nick. She breaks off the ki leans her lips close to his ear, WHISPERS—

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Who do you think had that little girl kidnapped?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: We see into Nick’s eyes as he realizes the nature of the devil he’s just made a deal with-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECURITY GUARD writes down his observations as he watch Nick and Maya on one of many SURVEILLANCE MONITORS on his desk- INT. RODRIGO’S BAR/KITCHEN - DAY Three tough-looking GUYS in shades enter the near-empty b They head straight for the back room, the BARTENDER calli out-

dialogues.speaker: BARTENDER
dialogues.text: ¢En qué puedo servirles, sefores? We FOLLOW them into the KITCHEN. The same Old Man is shucking oysters. He barely looks up as the three enter-

dialogues.speaker: TOUGH GUY
dialogues.text: éEl congelador?  99. The Old Man points with his knife. They go to the freezer epen it-

dialogues.speaker: FREEZER
dialogues.text: Nestled among the chilling cervezas is the same AEROSOL C Nick dug up on Isla Nublar. The heed Tough Guy lifts it u to his face, gives it a twist- the top pops up to reveal CHAMBER in which lie several METAL TUBES-

dialogues.speaker: TOUGH GUY
dialogues.text: Eso es. (This is it.) Or is it?

dialogues.speaker: BAR
dialogues.text: The thugs hurry out of the bar with their prize. The man the foreground who was passed out with his face on the ba counter raises his head to watch them go. It is OVERTON-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick waits at the edge of a CLEARING in the JUNGLE, his A parked on a narrow LOGGING ROAD behind him- He looks at his watch, then at the sky- We hear the DRONE of AIRPLANES-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small VILLAGE with a RIVER on one side and the JUNGLE W on the other- A half-dozen MILITARY VEHICLES of various sorts are parke the center of the village, MERCENARIES waiting around for orders-—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the biggest structure a COMMAND HEADQUARTERS has b set up. A bank of DINO-CAM MONITORS takes up one wall, manned by a pair of GRENDEL TECHNICIANS-  100. REPRESENTATIVES, some in military unifcrm, some not, from Asia, Europe, Africa, Latin America, and Russia mill arou waiting for the show to start- Joyce stands nervously looking at his watch, as Baron von Drax chats in German with a uniformed COLONEL nearby, presenting him with a HALBERD from his collection- The Colonel poses for a SNAPSHOT with the weapon- Sherman checks his BIO-METERS as Maya sits nearby glumly regarding the scene-

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: We‘ve got them! Hub-bub in many languages as the spectators cross to watc the monitors. Joyce acts as master of ceremonies-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Though the objective is not a great distance from here, we felt that any demonstration of our special capabilities should include an aerial insertion-

dialogues.speaker: MONITORS
dialogues.text: On most of the monitors we see images too dark or fuzzy t interpret. Suddenly, on one, we see the CARGO DOOR ofa TRANSPORT aircraft slide open and the camera is launched open air as its bearer jumps out! ANOTHER and ANOTHER of monitors show the same image, open SKY, then bits of the JUNGLE below-

dialogues.speaker: RUSSIAN OBSERVER
dialogues.text: What is big deal? Dropping weapons from plane- A collective GASP as on one monitor Orestes, suspended fr PARACHUTE, swings into frame!

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (smug) That, gentlemen, is the big deal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sky is full of PARACHUTES floating earthward with dinosaurs hanging from them-
We TILT to Nick, who shakes his head in amazement, then speaks into his headset-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Squad form and proceed to target. You’re on your own, fellas. He gets onto the ATV, shoots a last look at the sky, then motors away down the logging road-

dialogues.speaker: SKY
dialogues.text: We drift down, shooting past Spartacus toward the clearin from under the canopy of the chute. His powerful legs eas take up the shock of landing- POP! the BUCKLES on his chute HARNESS separate with a sma explosion and the harness falls away, Spartacus stepping from it. We see other squad members making similar landin in the BG-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spectators are amazed as they watch—

dialogues.speaker: MONITOR
dialogues.text: Captured on another creature's camera, we see CASPER hang in a tree at the edge of the clearing, chute snagged on branches—

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I must inform you that this is the first jump our operatives have undertaken- POP! the harness releases and Casper falls a few feet bef snatching a branch with his tail, then swinging to grab t trunk of the tree before shinnying down quick as a squirr

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: But as you see, they are somewhat more resilient than conventional forces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The squad quickly melt into the jungle at the far side of clearing-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick pulls up in the ATV, hurries into the HQ building-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick crosses to Joyce, glancing at the dino-cam images of jungle being traversed-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: I thought we‘d lose at least one.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: How do the bio readouts look?

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: (watching meters) The heart-rates went through the roof when we dumped them out of the plane, but they’re back in predator mode already. Nick is distracted as he sees a half-dozen narco-looking CHARACTERS watching one of the monitors-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Who are they?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Those are the gentlemen who hired us.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: They look just like the bunch we’re trying to take out.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: A rival group. They've made a deal with the government, and their end of it starts with eliminating Pepe Aguilar.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: We’re working for drug-runners?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (shrugs) An unproven product, the need for a great deal of discretion- and they were the highest bidders. Nick scowls as Joyce waves somebody over-  103.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: All the major players have sent somebody to observe- you know Andy Slade- SLADE, a hard-looking American, nods to Nick-

dialogues.speaker: SLADE
dialogues.text: Harris. I think it was at a checkpoint on the Turkish border-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You still in?

dialogues.speaker: SLADE
dialogues.text: Consulting. (nods towards monitors) These things know what they’re doing?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Only too well.

dialogues.speaker: SCREEN
dialogues.text: BLINKING RED DOTS move across the screen toward a rectang swatch of GREEN-

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Approaching outer perimeter! The Tracking Technician points to an eighth blinking dot, behind the others-

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: This one’s still lagging-

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: Zeiss enters, crosses rapidly to the Baron, whispers something. The Baron‘s face reddens, he signals Joyce to come over- We meet Joyce as he joins the Baron-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Something wrong?

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: The aerosol can has arrived in Draxburg.  104.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Excellent!

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Dr. Wetzel has analyzed the DNA. He saw it right away.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Saw what?

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Hoptoads! He gives us genes from hoptoads! Joyce looks over at Nick, furious-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: (to Zeiss) Stay with Harris and the woman. The slightest sign of sabotage or escape and you kill them.

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: (smiles) My pleasure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The raptors move rapidly through thick jungle. Spartacus, the lead, stops to sniff the air. The others freeze behin him, alert- Spartacus makes a low GRUNT and Casper and Pollux move forward. The others follow the two spitters, more slowly

dialogues.speaker: POLLUX
dialogues.text: The spitter slinks with his belly close to the ground, he low, barely disturbing the underbrush. Suddenly he pops h head up and CHLLLLLLOK! spits- _-we WHIP PAN as SPLAT! the black MUCUS GOB hits the lens SURVEILLANCE CAMERA mounted in a tree-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two OUTER PERIMETER SCREENS are suddenly BLACK on the surveillance CONSOLE. A NARCO-GUARD stands looking over t shoulder of the baffled DESK MAN-  105.

dialogues.speaker: NARCO-GUARD
dialogues.text: Qué pasdé? (What happened?)

dialogues.speaker: DESK MAN
dialogues.text: Acabamos de perder el imagen- (We just lost the image-)

dialogues.speaker: NARCO-GUARD
dialogues.text: Viste algo? (Did you see anything?)

dialogues.speaker: DESK MAN
dialogues.text: Creo que viera un legarto. (I think I saw a lizard.)

dialogues.speaker: NARCO-GUARD
dialogues.text: Un legarto? (A lizard?) The Desk Man spreads his arms to indicate size-

dialogues.speaker: DESK MAN
dialogues.text: Un legarto grandote. (A really big lizard.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PERIMETER GUARD is out walking sentry at the edge of th jungle, pacing, listening. He stops by a tree, pulls out cigarette, lights it- suddenly a SPITTER swings down inch from his face, hanging upside-down from a branch by its t and SNAP! grabs the startled man’s face in its jaws! Several of the deinonychus pass the grisly scene, hopping like kangaroos over a two-foot-high TRIP WIRE strung betw the trees-

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER AREA
dialogues.text: A loose shot as a SQUAD of NARCO GUARDS pass, automatic weapons ready, searching the trees all around them. Their SQUAD LEADER is talking softly into a cell phone-

dialogues.speaker: SQUAD LEADER
dialogues.text: No hay huellas de nadie. Veremos las cdmaras- la humedad no las sirve. (There‘s no sign of anybody. We‘1ll check the cameras- the humidity is tough on them.)  106. We let the squad exit frame, HOLD a beat, then Spartacus Perseus seem to MATERIALIZE from the jungle before our ey their chameleon-like camouflage and ability to freeze sti so effective that we were staring at them all the while. They move off in the opposite direction-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two MACHINE-GUNNERS peer out at the jungle through camo- netting, crouched behind their MACHINE GUN in a dirt-floo bunker, listening hard-

dialogues.speaker: MACHINE-GUNNER
dialogues.text: Juro que puedo oir algo- o mejor, sentir algo- (I swear I can hear something- or sense something-) FWOOOOOSH! Casper bursts up from the floor behind them, D FLYING! As they whirl he HISSES, his spiny MANTLE POPPING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in the main BARRACKS for the NARCO-SOLDIERS, which looks not unlike a jock dorm at a large university- poste of babes on the walls, guys lounging around in their underwear, smoking, reading magazines, watching a GAMERA (giant Japanese turtle that emits flames from its butt wh it flies to the rescue) MOVIE on a BIG SCREEN TV- WHAM! Orestes bursts in the front entrance! WHAM! Achilles bursts in the rear entrance! BEDLAM as the deinonychus charge in from opposite ends, slashing, tearing, chomping at the SCREAMING, terror-stri narcos!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bap-bap-bap-bap-bap-bap! A MACHINE GUN opens up on the ma TOWER as Spartacus and Orestes streak into the compound! Hector scrambles up the side of the tower and CHOMP! deal with the SENTRY!

dialogues.speaker: DRUG LAB
dialogues.text: A half-dozen NARCOS come running out of the long, rectang DRUG LAB, BLASTING away with their weapons as Spartacus charges straight at them, rounds smacking into his body a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: © 107. POUNCE! Orestes leaps on top of the men from the ROOF beh them, flattening a pair and then tearing into the others-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEPE AGUILAR, wearing nothing but a lot of gold chains, k back in his enormous JACUZZI, water-jets churning away, w a pifia colada in hand and SALSA MUSIC on the stereo. He locks up, surprised to be interrupted, as a BODYGUARD hus in-

dialogues.speaker: BODYGUARD
dialogues.text: Nos atacamos! (We're being attacked! )

dialogues.speaker: PEPE AGUILAR
dialogues.text: De quién? (By who?)

dialogues.speaker: BODYGUARD
dialogues.text: (panicked) Dinosaurios! (Dinosaurs! ) Pepe starts to LAUGH-

dialogues.speaker: PEPE AGUILAR
dialogues.text: Ha sido probando el producto otra vez! Aqui preparamos las drogas, no las tomamos! (You've been sampling the product again! We make drugs here- we don’t take them!) The Bodyguard lays an Uzi at the edge of the jacuzzi and hurries away-

dialogues.speaker: BODYGUARD
dialogues.text: Le dejo esto! (I'll leave this for you!) We HOLD on Pepe, shaking his head-

dialogues.speaker: PEPE AGUILAR
dialogues.text: Guardaespaldas pendejos! (Idiot bodyguards! ) He takes a drink, closes his eyes and sinks back into the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All around we hear sporadic GUNFIRE and human SCREAMS as Spartacus kills the GUARD in front of a fenced-in area, t CLANG! tears the gate off its hinges- A couple dozen PRISONERS, kidnapped by the narcos, cower against the back fence as Spartacus steps in, ROARS, then lowers his head to sniff at the petrified occupants-

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN
dialogues.text: Se acabo! Se acabo el mundo. (It’s the end! It’s the end of the world.) Spartacus straightens, ROARS again, and exits. A few of t prisoners fall of their knees to give thanks for their salvation-

dialogues.speaker: COURTYARD
dialogues.text: GUNFIRE and SCREAMS continue as we FOLLOW a trio of narco who jump into an SUV and patch out, swerving to avoid Orestes, who is busy demolishing a GUARDHOUSE- The SUV hurtles toward the exit gate, but- The ANKYLOSAURUS, last to arrive, is just coming in, its armored body filling the opening! The driver slams on the brakes, throwing the SUV into a sideways skid, DUST billowing up, till SMASH! it hits the ankylosaurus and flips over its back, landing behind it o its side! WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! The beast instinctively begins to smash the metal attacker flat with the club on its powerful tai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hector charges through the long DRUG LAB, chasing terrifi WORKERS before him, APPARATUS smashing all around as he rampages through and over the tables, leaving WHITE POWDE flying, sizzling CHEMICAL SPILLS and a spreading FIRE in wake-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The narcos who have hired Grendel are dismayed as they se the lab trashed on HECTOR’S MONITOR-

dialogues.speaker: HEAD NARCO
dialogues.text: This wasn’t our deal! What is it doing?!

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: What's his problem?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: They were hoping to be able to- to recycle most of the drugs and equipment in there. Nick catches Maya shooting him an ‘I told you so’ look-

dialogues.speaker: SCREEN
dialogues.text: The blinking dots have congregated in one small area-

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: They’‘re inside Pepe's mansion now! INT. PEPE’S MANSION - PORTRAIT A PORTRAIT of Pepe, dressed slick and leaning on a red Porshe, hangs on the wall- SPLAT! ssssssssss! A plug of SPITTER MUCUS hits the portrait and bubbles, the acid in burning the canvas-— -we PAN to the HALLWAY, decorated in very expensive, very taste, where the BODYGUARD sprints past FIRING the occasi shot behind as Casper chases after him! He ducks around t corner- we hear a ROAR and a SCREAM and then Orestes trot from around the corner with the Bodyguard, still struggli in his jaws!

dialogues.speaker: LOBBY
dialogues.text: TROPICAL PLANTS adorn the ostentatious LOBBY that leads t curving marble STAIRCASE. A pair of NARCOS come running d the staircase, one tripping and sprawling down end-over-e and the other gaining the ground floor and running straig at us but-  ‘e 110. Perseus appears above him, leaping over the bannister and landing with both feet THUMP! right on top of the man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pepe, hearing the SCREAMS and GUNFIRE outside, now has th Uzi in hand and a worried look on his face. BAM! BAM! BAM Something is battering the vault door that protects him-

dialogues.speaker: HALLWAY
dialogues.text: A FIRE has started further down the hallway, SMOKE starti to billow as the ankylosaurus pounds the VAULT DOOR again again with his tail, the wall around the door starting to CRUMBLE- the smoke envelops the beast just as CRASH! the whole section of wall and door fall inward!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pepe stands in the middle of the still-churning jacuzzi d his Scarface routine, Uzi pointed and ready, trying to se through the smoke-

dialogues.speaker: PEPE AGUILAR
dialogues.text: Bueno- quieres jugar? (Come on- you want to play?) Suddenly the two spitters leap through the smoke, mantles puffed out, SHREIKING and land SPLASH! SPLASH! smack in t jacuzzi with Pepe! We hear SCREAMING, SPLASHING, SNARLING as BLOOD sprays on fluffy white towels hanging on the wall-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joyce leads the OBSERVERS out to their waiting vehicles-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: We'll head over while they’re mopping up and you can get a closer look.

dialogues.speaker: RUSSIAN OBSERVER
dialogues.text: This is safe?

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: If we can turn them on, I assure you we can turn them off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: fe lll. They pass and Nick and Maya exit. Zeiss is waiting by a vehicle, pointing his PISTOL at Nick's head-

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: You two are coming with me.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Our deal was-

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: Just get in!

dialogues.speaker: EXT/INT. DRUG COMPOUND
dialogues.text: Quiet. The place looks bombed-out— Toppled TOWERS- Burning BUILDINGS- The trashed, burning interior of the LAB- BODIES and furniture strewn around in the BARRACKS. On th huge TV, lying on its side now, Gamera is saving small Japanese children- The ANKYLOSAURUS is peacefully grazing on the tropical foliage in the LOBBY of Pepe's mansion, BLOOD SMEARS on t white marble floor and staircase- BLOOD fills the still churning JACUZZI- The kidnapped PRISONERS cautiously step out from their enclosure for a look-

dialogues.speaker: COURTYARD
dialogues.text: The squad, all present except the ankylosaurus, regroups courtyard. Achilles is badly wounded, BLOOD covering his throat and staining his body armor. Spartacus approaches slowly, and CRACK! lashes out with a front claw to smash shoulder-mounted camera! He reaches up and grasps the CONTROL-IMPLANT with his dextrous claws and RIPS it from Achilles’ ear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: B CONVOY of vehicles, the CONTROL WAGON in the lead, move down the narrow dirt road through the jungle-  112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joyce and Sherman watch, incredulous, as the other raptor foliow suit, SMASHING each other’s cameras, one dashboard monitor after enother going BLACK!

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: What are they doing?

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Deactivate! I want them out of commission when we get there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The raptors, with their cameras and implants all destroye head out through the front gate, stepping over the flippe battered SUV-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sherman watches the TRACKING SCREEN in the vehicle with mounting alarm-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: They're still moving-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: I don’t know!

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Where are they going? Sherman watches the BLINKING RED DOTS for a moment. He gi Joyce a scared look-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Toward us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zeiss has the pistol casually pointed toward Nick as he drives, Maya in the back seat-  113. ®

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: Did you think you could fool us with the frogs?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I figured once I had the can somebody was going to come after me. Setting up a decoy was just a way to buy time.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: ZEISS
dialogues.text: Your boyfriend gave us the wrong can of genes. Maya looks to Nick, thrilled to hear this-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: You- ? Zeiss looks up ahead- ® ZEISS Why are we stopping?

dialogues.speaker: CONVOY
dialogues.text: Joyce is out front, looking ahead down the narrow logging road, worried. Kroner, driving, sticks his head out of th Control Wagon-

dialogues.speaker: KRONER
dialogues.text: It’s too narrow to turn around.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: Well we can’t back up all the way to the village!

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: (calls from inside wagon) They're a quarter mile away and coming fast! DRIVERS and OBSERVERS are popping out of their vehicles n to see what the holdup is. The Baron calls, impatient—

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Why do we wait?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a problem on the road ahead.

dialogues.speaker: VON DPAX
dialogues.text: What could be the pr- (sees) Mein Gott in Himmel! We WHIP PAN to see the squad of raptors tearing down the toward the convoy! Everyone jumps back into their vehicles and there is a desperate automotive scramble as they all try to turn aro and speed away at once, resulting in something like a demolition derby, vehicles SMASHING into each other and i trees, getting stuck in the muck alongside the road and t RRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAWWWWWWWGH! Spartacus and his squad hit th convoy like a tidal wave, butting, slashing, kicking, knocking the small vehicles over and stomping on the larg ones- One MERCENARY is plucked clean off his MOTORCYCLE by Hect while another dodges away, only to have Pollux leap onto back of it and wrap his arms around the MOTORCYCLIST. The guy glances back to see who is hitchhiking, SCREAMS as th spitter opens its jaws! The NARCOS’ CAR, one tire slashed and bumping, and the MERCEDES carrying the Baron manage to turn and speed away In Nick's car SMASH! a deinonychus foot busts through the windshield, sickle-claw pinning Zeiss to his seat! Nick a Maya bail out their doors- Orestes and Perseus pursue a half-dozen OBSERVERS into th jungle. WHUMP! Slade, thoroughly chewed-upon, falls from above and lands hard on top of an suv!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baron von Drax looks over his DRIVER’s shoulder. The narc car ahead is fishtailing, unable to make speed and hold t road with the front tire blown-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Schnell! Schnell!

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: It's in our way!  115.

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Then push it out of the way! The Driver mashes the gas pedal-

dialogues.speaker: LOGGING ROAD
dialogues.text: The vehicles blast towards us, the Mercedes catching the of the narco car and WHAM! knocking it sideways to head-o against a roadside tree! One narco flies over us through windshield and the Mercedes blows by. Achilles peels off attack the remaining narcos as they stagger out of the wr and Spartacus continues after the Baron’s ride-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Baron is terrified-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: We don’t stop at the village, we go straight to the helicopter! THUMP! Something heavy rocks the car from above-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Was iss loess? CRUNCH! CLAWS punch through the roof above the driver's head! RIP! The roof is pulled open like the lid of a sardine can! The Driver loses control, the Mercedes slewi sideways and SMASH! coming to rest on its side in the tre Baron von Drax climbs out of the totalled Mercedes over t dead body of the Driver- He stands, turns-- Spartacus towers over him, ROARING-

dialogues.speaker: VON DRAX
dialogues.text: Nein! Nein! Du bist mein kind! But Spartacus is not moved by this profession of kinship IMPALES von Drax with a thrust of his sickle-claw!

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Sherman, one lens knocked out of his glasses and bleeding from the scalp, clumsily but hastily climbs a tree-  116.

dialogues.speaker: CONVOY
dialogues.text: smashed and upended vehicles litter the logging road. Qui now. Maya crawls out from under 4 trashed Humvee, right into t legs of- -Joyce. Claw-marks and blood on his chest, pistol in his hand, still a little stunned-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: They didn’t stop. No insulin, no adrenaline-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Willpower. Joyce turns his attention to her, points his pistol-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: They'll be back, you know.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Probably.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: No reason to think they won’t kill you, too.

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: No reason. He brings the pistol very close, aiming right between her eyes-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: I'll save them the trouble- WHOOOMP! Nick flies out of nowhere, tackling Joyce, and BLAM! the pistol going off as they hit the ground! They roll, trading punches, struggling to strangle each other, the pistol left on the ground- Joyce kicks Nick off him, rolls to his knees, looks about The HALBERD von Drax gave to the Colonel lies on the grou just beside him! Joyce comes up with the halberd and SWISH! SWISH! swings expertly, tauntingly at Nick, backing him up toward the t  117.

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: I was wrong about you, Nick. Tf thought you were smart. I thought they‘d baked all the idealism out of your skull in that POW camp. SWISH! He takes a mighty swing, Wick just able to duck un it- Maya pounces on the discarded PISTOL, aims, pulls the tri Out of ammo. Joyce swings, slicing Nick across the shoulder, Nick back up warily, BLEEDING—

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: How did you do it, Nick? How did you sabotage this?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: They did it on their own. They watched and waited- Joyce makes a rush and Nick falls backwards over a root. is helpless at Joyce's feet, Joyce with the halberd raise over his head like a woodsman about to chop-

dialogues.speaker: JOYCE
dialogues.text: They're animals, Nick. Throw them a bone and they'll do what you want— He hears a METAL SOUND as something behind him steps on c debris, whirls and THUNK! buries the halberd blade into t armored chest of Achilles, tottering above him! Achilles ROARS, grabs the halberd shaft and yanks it out his armor. He drops it and lunges for Joyce! Nick scrambles away on his hands and knees as we hear Joy SCREAMING as he’s torn to bits- Achilles drops Joyce's body to the ground, turns to step toward Nick-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Achilles, no! Stop. BLOOD is pumping out of the WOUND in the raptor’s neck, h eyes swimming in and out of focus, his blood sugar all us up. He turns to look at Maya, tilting his head, trying to understand-  He takes another step then FALLS like tall timber-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Nick! Maya starts toward him but is cut off by Casper, the spit darting in front of her, HISSING and DISPLAYING-

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Don’t move! Spartacus and the others come out of the trees, ringing around them. Spartacus sniffs Maya's body and face, Maya standing absolutely still, looking him in the eye- He steps away, rolls Achilles’ body over with his foot, sniffs it, then Nick- and then straightens. He TRUMPETS i triumph and trots off into the trees, the rest of the squ following! Maya runs to Nick, who is examining his bleeding shoulder

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Are you all right?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: First time I’ve been wounded with a fifteenth century weapon. How far you think they'll get without insulin? Maya looks into the jungle where the raptors disappeared-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: Hard to say. He puts his arm over her shoulder and they walk away from back down the logging road’ toward the village-

dialogues.speaker: MAYA
dialogues.text: So where are the embryos? The real ones?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: My deal was with John Hammond. What he does with them-- well, let's hope it turns out better than the last time.
SHERMAN —- TREE DUSK is starting to fall. Birds CALL, INSECTS HUM. Sherma Gecides it might be all clear-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: (calls below) Anybody left down there? Hello? No answer. There is @ FLAPPING SOUND, 4 SHADOW passing over Sherman- He looks up just as 4 huge PTEROSAUR lands in the tree opposite him-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: You're not supposed to be here. ANOTHER PTEROSAUR flaps down and settles into an even clo branch. Then ANOTHER. All three stare at Sherman. He starts to cautiously climb down-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Right. I‘ll just be going n- SCRAAAWWWWWWK! The first pterosaur lets out a bone-chilli noise, tiny rows of sharp teeth revealed as it opens its beak! Sherman freezes-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Listen, there's a lot of bodies just lying around down there--- Dead meat- num-num-num- The first pterosaur spreads its wings, opens its razor- toothed beak and steps along the branch toward Sherman-

dialogues.speaker: SHERMAN
dialogues.text: Nice birdy?

dialogues.speaker: JUNGLE CANOPY
dialogues.text: High above the jungle canopy, we hear a HUMAN SCREAM and SCREECH of PTEROSAURS! CREDITS ROLL.
